quest.name: Ascending to Empyreum
journal: Gondelimbaud appears to be waiting for you.
Gondelimbaud informs you that a residential district has been established in Ishgard, and that Thomelin will guide you there from the Brume.
With Thomelin at your side, you make way for Empyreum.
After arriving at Empyreum, you set out to speak with the Highmorn herald.
Having heard all there is to hear about Empyreum, you decide to report back to Gondelimbaud.
According to Gondelimbaud, the people of Ishgard are eager to welcome adventurers to Empyreum. You decide to speak with the resident caretaker for further details.
objectives: Speak with Thomelin, then head to Empyreum.
Report back to Gondelimbaud in the aetheryte plaza.

dialogue.name: GONDELIMBAUD
dialogue.text: Ah! Forename! I've been awaiting your return.

dialogue.name: GONDELIMBAUD
dialogue.text: You see, after you helped bring an end to the Dragonsong War, we have striven to rebuild the city.

dialogue.name: GONDELIMBAUD
dialogue.text: And thanks to the assistance of countless craftsmen, our efforts to restore the Firmament to its former glory are finally complete!

dialogue.name: GONDELIMBAUD
dialogue.text: In fact, House Dzemael assembled a team of masons so skilled and efficient that they were able to finish the construction of an entirely new quarter!

dialogue.name: GONDELIMBAUD
dialogue.text: Its name is “Empyreum,” and it was created to serve as a residential district for adventurers from across the realm.

dialogue.name: GONDELIMBAUD
dialogue.text: No amount of description can truly convey its splendor, so I have asked Thomelin to escort you there that you might see for yourself. Seek him out in the Brume when you have a moment!

dialogue.name: GONDELIMBAUD
dialogue.text: Thomelin will escort you to Empyreum. Seek him out in the Brume when you have a moment!

dialogue.name: THOMELIN
dialogue.text: Oh, my! 'Tis the savior of Ishgard! Perchance you've an interest in Empyreum? If so, say no more─I shall escort you there myself!

dialogue.name: THOMELIN
dialogue.text: Oh, my ladylord! You've graced us with your presence once more! Perchance you've an interest in Empyreum? If so, say no more─I shall escort you there myself!

dialogue.name: THOMELIN
dialogue.text: And fear not: the herald will surely be happy to answer any questions you may have.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Proceed to Empyreum?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: CARETAKER04172
dialogue.text: Welcome to Empyreum! As our restoration efforts progressed, they eventually expanded to include the construction of this little taste of heavens on earth.

dialogue.name: CARETAKER04172
dialogue.text: We are indebted to countless adventurers such as yourself who helped bring about an end to the Dragonsong War─and as thanks, we wish to provide a space for you to call home here in Ishgard.

dialogue.name: CARETAKER04172
dialogue.text: Of course, we will still require a nominal fee for any plots of land or apartments you purchase, but know that your gil will help us rebuild bigger and better than before.

dialogue.name: CARETAKER04172
dialogue.text: If you would like to hear more, please speak with the resident caretaker for further assistance!

dialogue.name: CARETAKER04172
dialogue.text: Have you been enticed by the splendor of Empyreum? If so, please speak with the resident caretaker for further assistance!

dialogue.name: GONDELIMBAUD
dialogue.text: So, Forename, what did you think of Empyreum? I do hope it was to your liking!

dialogue.name: GONDELIMBAUD
dialogue.text: Given that our borders were closed for so long, I worried that outsiders such as yourself might not take interest in this new district.

dialogue.name: GONDELIMBAUD
dialogue.text: But know that it is our sincerest wish that you and other noble souls will consider making Ishgard your new home!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The residential district Aethernet for Empyreum can be accessed through the Ishgard aetheryte.
